title: From Sardi's to Sicily The Biography of Marilyn Monroe: Marilyn's Secrets fifty years after her death
description: Marilyn's Secrets are revealed for the first time, fifty years after her death. The author has, researched and documented, the human behind the image. And though chapters, and two plays, Here I am Mother, the real story of Marilyn Monroe and, Mama Mia An interview, the author unravels, not only the mysteries, about her life, but her death.
author: Nancy Maniscalco Miracle
